Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by TakeoHonorable
--local Angle = math.acos(Facing:Dot(Vector)) (Is in radians)
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Properties = { Detection_Distance = 175, Field_Of_View = 90,--Medusa's capture view (Measured in degrees) Target_Field_Of_View = 50, --Maximum angle to freeze targets (Measured in degrees) }
local Self = script
local world = workspace
local Region = require(Self:WaitForChild("RegionModule"))
local Tool = Self.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local ray,Reg3,Vec3,Cframe,acos,Wait,huge,deg = Ray.new,Region3.new,Vector3.new,CFrame.new,math.acos,wait,math.huge,math.deg
local wrap,Pairs = coroutine.wrap,pairs
local FindPartOnRay = world.FindPartOnRayWithWhitelist
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")) }
local Sounds = { Scream = Handle:WaitForChild("Scream") }
local Eyes = {Handle:WaitForChild("RightEye"),Handle:WaitForChild("LeftEye")}
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in Pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
local function IsFrozen(Hum) -- Quick check to see if they're not stunned local Children = Services.ServerScriptService:GetChildren() for i=1, #Children do if Children[i]:IsA("Script") and Children[i].Name == "Freeze" and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target") and Children[i]:FindFirstChild("Target").Value == Hum.Parent then return true end end return false end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
local Character = Tool.Parent local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") local Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or Humanoid.Health == huge or Humanoid.MaxHealth == huge then return end Tool.Enabled = false
wrap(function() Sounds.Scream:Play() end)()
wrap(function() for i=1,#Eyes,1 do local children = Eyes[i]:GetChildren() for p=1,#children,1 do if children[p] and children[p]:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then children[p]:Emit(children[p].Rate) end end end end)()
local Capture = Region.new( Handle.CFrame * Cframe(0,0,-( ( Handle.Size.Z*.5 ) + ( Properties.Detection_Distance * .5 ) ) ), Vec3(1,1,1) * Properties.Detection_Distance ):Cast(Character) local CapHumanoids = {}
for i=1,#Capture,1 do
if Capture[i] and Capture[i].Parent then
local Hum,FF,Head = Capture[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"), Capture[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField"), Capture[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Head")
if Hum and Hum.Health > 0 and not FF and Head and not IsTeamMate(Player,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) and not IsInTable(CapHumanoids,Hum) then
CapHumanoids[#CapHumanoids+1] = Hum
local MedusaCFrame = Cframe(Handle.Position.X,Head.Position.Y,Handle.Position.Z) * (Handle.CFrame - Handle.Position)
local MedusaAngle = acos(MedusaCFrame.LookVector:Dot((Head.Position - MedusaCFrame.Position).Unit))
local TargetAngle = acos(Head.CFrame.LookVector:Dot((MedusaCFrame.Position - Head.Position).Unit))
--warn(deg(MedusaAngle) <= Properties.Field_Of_View, deg(TargetAngle), deg(TargetAngle) <= Properties.Target_Field_Of_View )
if deg(MedusaAngle) <= Properties.Field_Of_View and deg(TargetAngle) <= Properties.Target_Field_Of_View then
local hit,pos,nor = FindPartOnRay(world,ray( Handle.Position , ( Head.Position - Handle.Position ).Unit * Properties.Detection_Distance ),Capture,false)
if hit then
local Directory = hit.Parent
if Directory:IsA("Accoutrement") then
Directory = Directory.Parent
end
if Directory == Head.Parent and not Head.Anchored and not IsFrozen(Hum) then
--This is the target!
local MedusaFreeze = Self:WaitForChild("Freeze"):Clone()
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Target", Value = Hum.Parent, Parent = MedusaFreeze }
MedusaFreeze.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService MedusaFreeze.Disabled = false
end
end
end
end
end
end
Wait(6)
Tool.Enabled = true end
Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated)

local Self = script
local world = workspace
local Target = Self:WaitForChild("Target").Value
local Sounds = { IceCrack = Self:WaitForChild("IceCrack"), Shatter = Self:WaitForChild("Shatter") }
local StoneShirt,StonePants,StoneColors = Self:WaitForChild("StoneShirt"),Self:WaitForChild("StonePants"),Self:WaitForChild("StoneColors")
local Torso = Target:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Target:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
if not Target then Self:Destroy() end
local Vec3,fromRGB,Instant = Vector3.new,Color3.fromRGB,Instance.new
local Type,Pairs = type,pairs
local Humanoid = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Humanoid:UnequipTools()
local Stop = false coroutine.wrap(function() repeat Humanoid.JumpPower = 0 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:Wait() until Stop end)()
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instant(ty) for k, v in Pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
Sounds.IceCrack.Parent = Torso Sounds.IceCrack:Play()
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Disable = Self:WaitForChild("DisableBackpack") Disable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Disable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Disable,1) Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target).CharacterRemoving:Connect(function(Char)--keeps people from a hidden inventory local Enable = Self:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end) end
local FrozenParts = {}
local AffectedMeshes = {}
for _,parts in Pairs(Target:GetDescendants()) do if parts:IsA("BasePart") and parts.Parent == Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid:GetLimb(parts) then parts.Anchored = true FrozenParts[#FrozenParts+1] = parts parts.Material = Enum.Material.Concrete elseif parts:IsA("SpecialMesh") then AffectedMeshes[#AffectedMeshes+1] = {Mesh = parts,TextureId = parts.TextureId} parts.TextureId = "" end end
local CurrentShirt,CurrentPants,CurrentColors CurrentShirt = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt") CurrentPants = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants") CurrentColors = Target:FindFirstChildOfClass("BodyColors")
if CurrentShirt then CurrentShirt.Parent = nil end
if CurrentPants then CurrentPants.Parent = nil end
if CurrentColors then CurrentColors.Parent = nil end
StoneShirt.Parent = Target StonePants.Parent = Target StoneColors.Parent = Target
local Duration,Current_Time = 5.5,0
repeat Current_Time = Current_Time + Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until Current_Time >= Duration or Humanoid.Health <= 0
Sounds.Shatter.Parent = Torso Sounds.Shatter:Play() Services.Debris:AddItem(Sounds.Shatter,Sounds.Shatter.TimeLength+1)
Stop = true Humanoid.JumpPower = 50 Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
local Seed = Random.new(tick())
for _,mesh in Pairs(AffectedMeshes) do if mesh.Mesh then mesh.Mesh.TextureId = mesh.TextureId end end
for _, parts in Pairs(FrozenParts) do if parts then parts.Anchored = false parts.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic local DebrisIce = Create("Part"){ Size = Vec3(Seed:NextNumber(1,2),Seed:NextNumber(1,2),Seed:NextNumber(1,2)), Locked = true, Anchored = false, Massless = true, Name = "Broken Stone", CFrame = parts.CFrame, Transparency = 0, Material = Enum.Material.Concrete, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Color = (Seed:NextInteger(1,3) == 1 and fromRGB(99, 95, 98)) or fromRGB(163, 162, 165), Parent = world } Services.Debris:AddItem(DebrisIce,Seed:NextNumber(3,5)) end end
if StonePants then StonePants:Destroy() end
if StoneShirt then StoneShirt:Destroy() end
if StoneColors then StoneColors:Destroy() end
if CurrentPants then CurrentPants.Parent = Target end
if CurrentShirt then CurrentShirt.Parent = Target end
if CurrentColors then CurrentColors.Parent = Target end
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target) then local Enable = Self:WaitForChild("EnableBackpack") Enable.Parent = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Target):WaitForChild("Backpack") Enable.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(Enable,1) end
wait(2) -- Grace period (Your're Welcome EuroC2)
Self:Destroy()

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, false)

--Much efficient way to hide the backpack without causing lag
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")
StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled(Enum.CoreGuiType.Backpack, true)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)
